Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products CK-MB Reagent Pack
Regulation Name(s): Creatine Phosphokinase/Creatine Kinase Or Isoenzymes Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products CK-MB Reagent Pack, an immunometric immunoassay for quantitative CK-MB measurement on VITROS 3600 system
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative measurement of CK-MB in human serum and plasma (EDTA or heparin) to aid in diagnosis and treatment of myocardial infarction and muscle diseases such as progressive, Duchenne-type muscular dystrophy
